author: tbrandenburg
body:
@task Turn this into a simple UV project: https://colab.research.google.com/github/docling-project/docling/blob/main/docs/examples/rag_langchain.ipynb
and test it with a dummy PDF.
Keep it very simple.
Run it without an HuggingFace token.
I want to run it with "uv run docling-milvus-rag"
title: Docling RAG
